content:
ILocator ILocator Interface

In this Article

Edit

Represents the application of an access policy to an asset.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface ILocatorPublic Interface ILocator

Remarks

A locator provides access to an asset using the Path property.

Properties summary

AccessPolicy
AccessPolicy

Gets the IAccessPolicy that defines this locator.

AccessPolicyId
Asset
Asset

Gets the IAsset that this locator is attached to.

Name
Path
Path
StartTime
StartTime
Type
Type

Methods summary

Delete()
Delete()

Deletes the specified Locator, revoking any access it provided.
DeleteAsync()
DeleteAsync()

Asynchronously revokes the specified Locator, denying any access it provided.
Update(DateTime)
Update(DateTime)

Updates the expiration time of an Origin locator.
Update(Nullable<DateTime>, DateTime)
Update(Nullable(Of DateTime), DateTime)

Updates the start time or expiration time of an Origin locator.
UpdateAsync(DateTime)
UpdateAsync(DateTime)

Asynchronously updates the expiration time of an Origin locator.
UpdateAsync(Nullable<DateTime>, DateTime)
UpdateAsync(Nullable(Of DateTime), DateTime)
